package step1;

public class Yard {
		public Yard(int length,int width) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
		this.length = length;
		this.width = width;
	}
	private int length;
	private int width;
	double getPerimeter() {
		return 2*width +2*length;
	}
	double getAcreage() {
		return width*length;
	}
}
